name: Tic Tac Toe Pro HD
summary:
The best-selling Tic Tac Toe iPhone application is now available for the iPad!

Put away your pencil and paper, now you can play Tic Tac Toe in high-definition on your iPad. Tic Tac Toe Pro HD is the premier Tic Tac Toe app for the iPad. 

Tic Tac Toe Pro HD supports one player and two player gameplay, enabling you to play against another human or against your iPhone.  

The AI for one player mode includes three difficulty levels, so you can play against a computer player that matches your skill level. A move randomization engine ensures that your iPhone won't keep making the same moves over and over again.

Tic Tac Toe Pro HD offers a host of exciting features, including:

* Great graphics and exciting sound effects
* Configurable player names and score tracking 
* OpenFeint achievements 
* Automatic save when you get a phone call or exit the application
